attributes.action: Send money, food and drinks to help the homeless people in the north east of uk
attributes.additional_details: Facebook provides several groups north east homeless, Shining stars - helping the homeless, Making Winter Warmer For Those Without.  I have, along with many other people who post to facebook, seen people homeless and almost on deaths door from cold, hunger and without water or even a hot drink.  10/12/15 a woman posted she had seen paramedics called to a homeless man outside central station as he appeared to be dead.  The UK government must help out its own citizens as much as people from elsewhere.
attributes.background: There is a rising population of homeless in the UK.  Here in the North East there are groups of volunteers who help as much as they can.  People donate what they can.  The homeless have nowhere to turn.  They need help as much as anyone else in the rest of this world.
